content: X-FS C Formwork spacer with nail Formwork spacer with pre-mounted nail for positioning formwork on concrete footings ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Facilitates quick and easy positioning of formwork panels on concrete footings Designed for extremely high productivity – up to five times faster than traditional methods Easy to install – even on rough concrete surfaces Stronger bond with the concrete due to large openings Formwork spacers remain hardly visible or fully hidden in concrete after removing formwork Applications Positioning formwork on concrete footings ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimensions (LxWxH): 1.9 x 1.9 x 2.2 in Material: High-density polyethylene (HDPE), Halogen-free, Silicone-free Color: Light grey (RAL 7035) Technical Data | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 1.9 x 1.9 x 1.3 in | Material | High-density polyethylene (HDPE), Halogen-free, Silicone-free | Color | Light grey (RAL 7035) | Application | Formwork | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete, Masonry (solid limestone brick) | Minimum thickness of base material (concrete) | 80 mm | For use with (tools) | DX 2, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 407346 - Form stop X-FS C52 - Package Size 100 pc
tag_name: X-FS C Formwork spacer with nail
